item.title: Here's what happened to financial markets after Nixon pressured the Fed
item.description: Nomura looked back at how markets behaved during Nixon's pressure campaign on the Federal Reserve in the early 1970s.

item.title: Markets are sure the Fed will cut in September, but the path from there is much murkier
item.description: Friday's booming rally turned into Monday's reality check as investors weighed just how aggressive the Federal Reserve will be.

item.title: Insider report: The stocks with the biggest recent sales by executives from Circle Internet, Zillow, Applovin and more
item.description: Insider selling is followed by investors who expect the activity could point to deeper troubles at a company, though the motivations can vary.
